about:
Hello, my name is Meenesh Manish Solanki, and I am a computer engineering student at New York University, with a focus on real-time embedded systems, computer systems and architecture, and machine learning. I hold a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science from Gujarat Technological University, where I graduated with a GPA of 9.82/10 and ranked 1st in the university. Throughout my education and internships, I have gained a strong skill set in various programming languages such as Java and Python, as well as databases like SQL, MySQL, Oracle, and MongoDB. I have also worked with web technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and frameworks like Android, Spring, Spring Boot, and Maven. Additionally, I have experience with tools like Bash, Git, Buck, and Docker, and cloud technologies like AWS and Azure. I have also gained hands-on experience through internships at companies like Meta and Qualcomm Inc, where I worked on projects such as building a common library for Instagram and Facebook, and developing a test chip for new technology nodes. I have also participated in research projects and competitions, such as developing an application using the DKPro library for solving multiple-choice reading comprehension questions, which obtained the 2nd best score in the CLEF Entrance Exams competition. I am a proactive and dedicated individual who is always eager to learn and take on new challenges. I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and experience to your organization and contribute to its growth and success.


Extra Information about you, like hobbies and your goals.
Example Paragraph: I am passionate about my work. Because I love what I do, I have a steady source of motivation that drives me to do my best. In my last job, this passion led me to challenge myself daily and learn new skills that helped me to do better work. For example, I taught myself how to use Photoshop to improve the quality of our photos and graphics. I soon became the go-to person for any design needs.
